SEARCH
Package KI302.Melnyk.Lab2

Class Telephone

java.lang.Object
KI302.Melnyk.Lab2.Telephone
public class Telephone extends Object
Class Telephone represents a telephone. It includes components like Screen, Battery, and SimCard. The class logs its activities to a file named "telephone_log.txt".
Since:
version 1.0

  • Constructor Details

    • Telephone

      public Telephone() throws FileNotFoundException
      Default constructor. Creates a default phone and initializes the log file.
      Throws:
      FileNotFoundException - if the log file cannot be created.

    • Telephone

      public Telephone(String modelName, Screen screen, Battery battery, SimCard simCard) throws FileNotFoundException
      Constructor with parameters. Creates a custom phone and initializes the log file.
      Parameters:
      modelName - The model name of the phone.
      screen - The screen object for the phone.
      battery - The battery object for the phone.
      simCard - The SIM card object for the phone.
      Throws:
      FileNotFoundException - if the log file cannot be created.
